document_data.name: Ceremony of Honor to Helm
document_data.mainbody: The '''Ceremony of Honor to Helm''' was a religious event observed by worshipers of [[Helm]], He of the Unsleeping Eyes.
document_data.Description: The ceremony occurred every four years on [[Shieldmeet]] following the last day of [[Flamerule]] and the first day of [[Eleasis]]. This was the only calendar-specific event observed by all members of the Helmite faith and [[Church of Helm]].
